page.title: 08ROWNER,GOSPORT.
page.content: { Rowner}is a parish in the borough of{Gosport}situated on the south coast by the waters of the Solent.A large proportion of the community are members of{H.M.Forces,}who are accomodated in married quarters.These quarters are either semi-detached or terraced dwellings. There are no large,enclosed parks or sports grounds but there are numerous play areas scattered between the accommodation blocks.The large population of children can therefore play safely near to home.Pre-school children are also well provided for with several play-groups run in conjunction with the Play-Group Association. The Rowner Recreation Centre is administered by the{Royal Navy Welfare {Association}and offers family membership-use of the pool and bar.
